name: Enemies Don't Die!
description:
Enemies Don’t Die! is a split screen 2D multiplayer action-platformer game, where players must shoot enemies to move them to the opponent's screen. The player with the most enemies on their side loses when the round ends.

Two xbox controllers are needed to play.

Development team:

Lead Game Designer - Jake Robertson

Lead Artist - Noon Sok

Lead Programmer - Heath Legg

Lead UI Designer - Jarrod Vandenberg

Lead Audio Designer - Ashur Martek
